      void CreatureAction.doAction​(Brain brain, Creature creature, Board board, double timeStep)
      This function is called after the creature's brain's think() method is called.
      double CreatureEatBehavior.getCreatureEatAmount​(Creature c, Tile t, double attemptedAmount, double timeStep)
      Called when a creature tries to eat food from a tile to determine how successful it is.
